Class Wallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wallet

  • public class Wallet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class could add, delete and modify informatiom of credit cards and also change the distribution of coins and compare the coins to other wallet.
    Author:
    Zhi Heng Zhu

        Returns:

                           int otherYear,
                           int otherMonth)
        This method could modify the expiry date of a credit card.
        Parameters:
        indexedCard - The position of the card in the credit card array that the user is about to update.
        otherYear - A new year indicated by user to update
        otherMonth - A new month indicated by user to update

      • addCoins

        public double addCoins(int newNickels,
                       int newDimes,
                       int newQuarters,
                       int newLoonies,
                       int newToonies)
        This method adds coins to a wallet and calculate the total value after modification.
        Parameters:
        newNickels - The number of nickels to user wants to add
        newDimes - The number of dimes to user wants to add
        newQuarters - The number of quarters to user wants to add
        newLoonies - The number of loonies to user wants to add
        newToonies - The number of toonies to user wants to add
        Returns:
        the total value of the updated coins

        Parameters:

        Returns:
